# insert(_:)

**Instance Method**

Add a new part to the container. Returns true if added. Returns false if it already exists.

## Declaration

```swift
@discardableResult mutating func insert(_ part: MeshResource.Part) -> Bool
```

## Using the collection

- **count**: Number of parts.
- **isEmpty**: True if there are no parts.
- **remove(id:)**: Remove a part by id.
- **removeAll()**: Remove all the parts.
- **update(_:)**: Update an existing part. The old part is returned.

items.description: True if there are no parts.
items.name: isEmpty

items.description: Update an existing part. The old part is returned.
